StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetFormMetaData]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @PackageId uniqueiden..er ) AS
SELECT p.[PackageId], si.[Sec.onItemId], si.[FriendlyName], '.pdf' as FileExtension, f.[Valid], f.[Signed], f.[Size], 1 as DataFileType, -- 1 is DataFileType.Form si.[SortOrder] FROM [ACP].[Form] f INNER JOIN [ACP].[Sec.onItem] si ON si.[Sec.onItemId] = f.[Sec.onItemId] INNER JOIN [ACP].[Sec.on] s ON s.[Sec.onId] = si.[Sec.onId] INNER JOIN [ACP].[Package] p ON p.[PackageId] = s.[PackageId] WHERE p.[PackageId] = @PackageId
